Projects

Path Visualiser
The "Path Visualizer" project is a web application designed to visually demonstrate various pathfinding algorithms in action. It allows users to select different algorithms, such as Dijkstra's, A Star, and DFS, to see how they navigate through a grid to find the shortest path between two points. This interactive tool is useful for educational purposes, helping users understand the mechanics and efficiency of each algorithm.

React Kanban
In a React Kanban app, tasks are represented as cards, and these cards move through different stages or columns on a board, such as "To Do," "In Progress," and "Done." Users can easily drag and drop cards between columns to update the status of tasks, providing a visual representation of the workflow.
